r.d:
The most accessible way to manage your pear-compatible packages.
This frontend's most valuable features are: * Webbased: no remote shell access needed. * Fully channel aware: no default channel, all channels are managed at the same time * Unique docviewer: read the installed documentation in your borwser. * Plus all features of the PEAR Installer.
r.n: Bugfix release for PEAR >= 1.8.0 * Fix Bug #16087 Failed opening required 'PEAR/Remote.php' [saltybeagle] * Fix Bug #16089 Installed packages overview shows "Array" [saltybeagle]
